name: B-Game
description:
A little game about Bees collecting nectar for the coming Winter. Each Winter becomes gradually more difficult. Guide your hive around by holding down the mouse button. Avoid Angry rain clouds or your worker Bees will be unable to collect pollen until they dry out near the Sun.

Tools used: Unity 2021.2.8f1, Aesprite, 1BitDragon, Trello, ScreenToGif Libraries used: DOTWeen
